error_forward_not_found: Error: No port forwarding found with ID '%s'
error_config_no_forwards: Error: Config '%s' has no active port forwarding
error_kubectl_not_found: Error: kubectl not found. Please install it first.
error_jq_not_found: Error: jq not found. Please install it first.
use_config_list: Please use 'brow config list' to see available configurations
waiting_for_pod: Waiting for proxy Pod to be ready...
error_connection_failed: Error: Could not create connection, please check configuration and network status
help_cmd_connect: brow connect <config_name> [local_port]     Create connection to specified config
help_cmd_stop: brow stop <forward_id|config_name>       Stop connection and delete Pod
help_cmd_config_list: brow config list                        List all configurations
help_cmd_config_show: brow config show <name>                 Show specific configuration details
help_cmd_pod_list: brow pod list                           List all current Pods
help_cmd_pod_info: brow pod info <config_name>             View Pod details for specified config
help_cmd_pod_delete: brow pod delete <config_name>           Delete Pod for specified config
help_cmd_pod_cleanup: brow pod cleanup                        Clean up expired Pods
help_cmd_forward_list: brow forward list                       List active forwards (same as brow list)
help_cmd_forward_stop: brow forward stop <id|config_name>      Stop forwarding (without deleting Pod)
help_cmd_forward_start: brow forward start <config_name> [local_port]  Start port forwarding (same as brow connect)
help_cmd_health_check: brow health-check                        Check and fix inconsistent states
help_cmd_language: brow language                           Show current language setting
help_cmd_language_set: brow language set <language_code>        Set language (zh, en, ...)
help_cmd_help: brow help                               Show this help information
help_example_config_add: brow config add mysql-dev oasis-dev-aks-admin 10.0.0.1 3306 3306 mysql 30m
